bug.author: raimannma
bug.summary: TypeScript: Bundling with Parcel or Webpack
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Description</denchmark-h>
The ParcelBundler doesn't work right at the typescript branch. I had problems with the threads.js lib. Description on the website of threads.js: <denchmark-link:https://threads.js.org/getting-started#build-with-webpack>https://threads.js.org/getting-started#build-with-webpack</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://threads.js.org/getting-started#build-with-parcel-bundler>https://threads.js.org/getting-started#build-with-parcel-bundler</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h3>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
Try the distribution files in a browser environment. <denchmark-h:h3>Tasks</denchmark-h>
Consider Webpack or Parcel Implement it
